lines_of_credit.name: Credit Card Balances
lines_of_credit.description: My credit card balances is NEW. The application is built on Spring 2.x. It uses the latest/greatest technology but it is not immune to vulnerabilities

investments.name: Investments
investments.description: My investments account has been around a few years. This application is built on Spring Boot 1.x and it could use a framework refresh

checking.name: Checking
checking.description: My crusty old checking account that has been around for the last 20 years. This application is built on apache struts 1.x. No Spring Boot!
